scripts.upload: npm run compile && npm run webidl2 && node tools/publish.mjs --tag next
scripts.release: npm run compile && npm run compile --prefix ../core && npm run compile --prefix linter && node tools/release.mjs
scripts.clean: rimraf build dist lib generated native/build* native/lib* native/cross* native/NativeBridge* native/ace* out external-subset
scripts.idl2peer:compile: npm run compile && npm run idl2peer:libace && npm run idl2peer:arkoala && cd out/ts-peers && tsc -p . && rollup -c
scripts.tracker:ets: npm run compile && node . --idl2peer --reference-names generation-config/references/ets-sdk.refs.json --no-type-checker --input-files $(find ../etsgen/out/idl -type f | tr '\n' ' ') --output-dir ../doc --generator-target tracker --tracker-status ../doc/COMPONENTS_STATUS.md
scripts.tracker:ver: sed "1iSDK version:    `git -C ../interface_sdk-js rev-parse HEAD` `git -C ../interface_sdk-js name-rev --name-only HEAD`" -i ../doc/COMPONENTS.md && sed "1iIDLize Version: `git rev-parse HEAD` `git name-rev --name-only HEAD`" -i ../doc/COMPONENTS.md
scripts.tracker:ets:all: npm run tracker:ets && npm run tracker:ver
scripts.check:peers: npm run setup-out -C .. -- --out arkgen/out/ts-peers  --template ts_peers && npm run idl2peer:compile
scripts.check:subset: npm run setup-out -C .. -- --out arkgen/out/ts-subset --template ts_subset && npm run make:ts:subset && cp -r tests/subset out/ts-subset/generated/tests && cd out/ts-subset && tsc -p .
scripts.check:subset:run: npm run rollup:host:subset && npm run compile:native-node-host-ts-subset && node out/ts-subset/lib/main.js
scripts.check:peers:idl: npm run setup-out -C .. -- --out arkgen/out/ts-peers  --template ts_peers && npm run idl2peer:compile && npm run compile:native-node-host-full && node tools/check-headers.mjs && node out/ts-peers/lib/main.js
scripts.check:peers:ets: npm run run:sdk --prefix ../etsgen && npm run setup-out -C .. -- --out arkgen/out/ets-ts-peers  --template ts_peers && npm run compile && npm run check:peers:ets:generate && cd out/ets-ts-peers && tsc -p . && rollup -c
scripts.check:peers:ets:run: npm run check:peers:ets && npm run compile:native-node-host-full-ets && node out/ets-ts-peers/lib/main.js
scripts.check:subset:fuzz: npm run compile && npm run check:subset && node . --dts2test --base-dir ./,./tests/subset --input-dir ./tests/subset/ets,./tests/subset/api --output-dir ./out/ts-subset/generated/fuzz && npm run compile:native-node-host-ts-subset && tsc -p ./out/ts-subset && node ./out/ts-subset/generated/fuzz
scripts.check:arkts:subset:tsc: npm run compile && npm run setup-out -C .. -- --out arkgen/out/arkts-subset-tsc --template arkts_subset_tsc && npm run make:arkts:subset:tsc && cd out/arkts-subset-tsc && npm run compile
scripts.check:arkts:peers:tsc: npm run compile && npm run setup-out -C .. -- --out arkgen/out/arkts-peers-tsc --template arkts_peers_tsc && npm run make:arkts:peers:tsc && cd out/arkts-peers-tsc && npm run compile
scripts.compile:native-node-host-java-subset: npm run configure:native-node-host-java-subset && cd native && meson compile --verbose -C build-node-host-java-subset && meson install -C build-node-host-java-subset
scripts.compile:native-node-host-ts-subset: npm run configure:native-node-host-ts-subset && cd native && meson compile --verbose -C build-node-host-ts-subset && meson install -C build-node-host-ts-subset
scripts.compile:native-node-host-arkts-subset: npm run configure:native-node-host-arkts-subset && cd native && meson compile --verbose -C build-node-host-arkts-subset && meson install -C build-node-host-arkts-subset
scripts.compile:native-node-host-arkts-full: npm run configure:native-node-host-arkts-full && cd native && meson compile --verbose -C build-node-host-arkts-full && meson install -C build-node-host-arkts-full
scripts.compile:native-node-host-arkts-full-ets: npm run configure:native-node-host-arkts-full-ets && cd native && meson compile --verbose -C build-node-host-arkts-full && meson install -C build-node-host-arkts-full
scripts.compile:native-node-host-full: npm run configure:native-node-host-full && cd native && meson compile --verbose -C build-node-host-full && meson install -C build-node-host-full
scripts.compile:native-node-host-full-ets: npm run configure:native-node-host-full-ets && cd native && meson compile --verbose -C build-node-host-full && meson install -C build-node-host-full
scripts.make:arkts:peers:ets: npm run compile && node . --idl2peer --reference-names generation-config/references/ets-sdk.refs.json --no-type-checker --input-files $(find ../etsgen/out/idl -type f | tr '\n' ' ') --output-dir out/ets-arkts-peers/generated --language arkts
scripts.compile:arkts:interop: cd ../external/interop/ && npm   run build:interop && echo ATTENTION: an interop is compiled without unmemoization here!
scripts.compile:arkts:libs: npm run compile:arkts:runtime && npm run compile:arkts:interop
scripts.make:compile:arkts:peers: npm run make:arkts:peers && npm run compile:arkts:peers && npm run compile:native-node-host-arkts-full && npm run compile:arkts:libs
scripts.make:compile:arkts:peers:ets: npm run make:arkts:peers:ets && npm run compile:arkts:peers:ets && npm run compile:native-node-host-arkts-full-ets && npm run compile:arkts:libs
scripts.compile:all:arkts: npm run make:arkts && npm run compile:arkts:subset && npm run compile:native-node-host-arkts-subset && npm run compile:arkts:libs
scripts.execute:panda:subset: ACE_LIBRARY_PATH=./native/build-node-host-arkts-subset LD_LIBRARY_PATH=./native bash ../external/incremental/tools/panda/arkts/ark --ark-entry-point @ohos.arkui.generated.main.ETSGLOBAL::main --ark-boot-files ../external/interop/build/interop.abc:../external/incremental/runtime/build/incremental.abc:../external/incremental/common/build/common.abc:./out/arkts-subset/abc out/arkts-subset/abc/all.abc --driver-log info  && echo 'Workaround: make sure compat/src/arkts/index.ts abc goes first until index.ETSGLOBAL issues is resolved'
scripts.execute:panda:peers: ACE_LIBRARY_PATH=./native/build-node-host-arkts-full LD_LIBRARY_PATH=./native bash ../external/incremental/tools/panda/arkts/ark --ark-entry-point @ohos.arkui.generated.main.ETSGLOBAL::main --ark-boot-files ../external/interop/build/interop.abc:../external/incremental/runtime/build/incremental.abc:../external/incremental/common/build/common.abc:./out/arkts-peers/abc out/arkts-peers/abc/all.abc  --driver-log info  && echo 'Workaround: make sure compat/src/arkts/index.ts abc goes first until index.ETSGLOBAL issues is resolved'
scripts.execute:panda:peers:ets: ACE_LIBRARY_PATH=./native/build-node-host-arkts-full LD_LIBRARY_PATH=./native bash ../external/incremental/tools/panda/arkts/ark --ark-entry-point @ohos.arkui.generated.main.ETSGLOBAL::main --ark-boot-files ../external/interop/build/interop.abc:../external/incremental/runtime/build/incremental.abc:../external/incremental/common/build/common.abc:./out/ets-arkts-peers/abc out/ets-arkts-peers/abc/all.abc  --driver-log info  && echo 'Workaround: make sure compat/src/arkts/index.ts abc goes first until index.ETSGLOBAL issues is resolved'
scripts.run:panda:subset: npm run compile:all:arkts && npm run execute:panda:subset
scripts.run:panda:peers: npm run make:compile:arkts:peers && npm run execute:panda:peers
scripts.run:panda:peers:ets: npm run run:sdk --prefix ../etsgen && npm run make:compile:arkts:peers:ets && npm run execute:panda:peers:ets
scripts.make:java: node . --api-version 99 --dts2peer --base-dir ./,./tests/java-subset --input-dir ./tests/java-subset/ets/,./tests/java-subset/resource --output-dir ./out/java-subset/generated --language java && npm run compile:native-node-host-java-subset && bash -c "find ./out/java-subset/generated/sig/arkoala-arkts/framework/java/src/org/koalaui/arkoala/ -name *.java > ./out/java-subset/generated/sig/arkoala-arkts/framework/java/src/org/koalaui/arkoala/files.list" && javac -sourcepath ./out/java-subset/generated/sig/arkoala-arkts/framework/java/src -d ./out/java-subset/bin @./out/java-subset/generated/sig/arkoala-arkts/framework/java/src/org/koalaui/arkoala/files.list
scripts.compile:java: npm run compile && npm run make:java
scripts.run:java: npm run compile:java && npm run compile:native-node-host-java-subset && ACE_LIBRARY_PATH=./native java -Djava.library.path=./native -cp ./out/java-subset/bin org.koalaui.arkoala.Main
scripts.run:java:concurrent: npm run compile:java && npm run compile:native-node-host-java-subset && java -Djava.library.path=./native -cp ./out/java-subset/bin org.koalaui.arkoala.Concurrent
scripts.compile:dummy-panda: npm run compile:java && npm run rollup:host:subset && cross-env mode=subset rollup -c rollup.config.dummy-panda.mjs
scripts.run:app:java: npm run compile:dummy-panda && ACE_LIBRARY_PATH=./native node lib/loader.js java
scripts.run:app:panda: cross-env mode=subset rollup -c rollup.config.dummy-panda.mjs && npm run compile:all:arkts && npm run execute:app:panda
scripts.light:app:ani: npm run compile:native-node-host-arkts-subset && PANDA_HOME=../external/incremental/tools/panda/node_modules/@panda/sdk ACE_LIBRARY_PATH=./native node lib/loader.js panda-ani
scripts.compile:native-ohos-subset-arm32: npm run check:subset && node ./native/nativeBuild.mjs subset arm32
scripts.compile:native-ohos-subset-arm64: npm run check:subset && node ./native/nativeBuild.mjs subset arm64
scripts.compile:native-ohos-full-arm32: npm run check:peers && node ./native/nativeBuild.mjs full arm32
scripts.compile:native-ohos-full-arm64: npm run check:peers && node ./native/nativeBuild.mjs full arm64
scripts.run:ohos-subset-arm32:perf: npm run compile:native-ohos-subset-arm32 && node ./ohos-app/runPerf.mjs subset arm32 mock
scripts.run:ohos-subset-arm64:perf: npm run compile:native-ohos-subset-arm64 && node ./ohos-app/runPerf.mjs subset arm64 mock
scripts.run:ohos-full-arm32:perf: npm run compile:native-ohos-full-arm32 && node ./ohos-app/runPerf.mjs full arm32 mock
scripts.compile:native-ohos-subset-arm64:v8: npm run check:subset && node ./native/nativeBuild.mjs subset arm64 v8
scripts.run:ohos-subset-arm64:perf:v8: npm run compile:native-ohos-subset-arm64:v8 && node ohos-v8/runPerfOnV8.mjs subset
scripts.rollup:ohos:full:arm64: npm run check:peers && cross-env mode=peers isOhos=true arch=arm64 rollup -c rollup.config.components.mjs
scripts.rollup:ohos:full:arm32: npm run check:peers && cross-env mode=peers isOhos=true arch=arm rollup -c rollup.config.components.mjs
scripts.rollup:ohos:subset:arm64: npm run check:subset && cross-env mode=subset isOhos=true arch=arm64 rollup -c rollup.config.components.mjs
scripts.rollup:ohos:subset:arm32: npm run check:subset && cross-env mode=subset isOhos=true arch=arm rollup -c rollup.config.components.mjs
scripts.rollup:host:subset: npm run check:subset && cd out/ts-subset && rollup -c
scripts.rollup:host:full: npm run check:peers && cd out/ts-peers && rollup -c
scripts.compile:cj:native:subset: npm run configure:cj:native:subset && cd native && meson compile --verbose -C build-cangjie-native-dummy
scripts.compile:cj:native: npm run configure:cj:native && cd native && meson compile --verbose -C build-cangjie-native-dummy
scripts.run:cj: npm run compile && node . --api-version 99 --dts2peer --base-dir ./,./tests/ --input-dir ./tests/cangjie-subset/ --output-dir ./out/cangjie/generated --language cangjie && npm run compile:cj:native && LD_LIBRARY_PATH=./native/build-cangjie-native-dummy:./../external/incremental-cj/runtime/ck:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH ACE_LIBRARY_PATH=./native/build-cangjie-native-dummy cjpm run
scripts.run:cj:full: npm run compile && node . --api-version 99 --dts2peer --base-dir ./,../sdk-patched/api,../sdk-patched/kits,../sdk-patched/arkts --input-dir ../sdk-patched/api/@internal/component/ets/,../sdk-patched/api/global --output-dir ./out/cangjie/generated --language cangjie && npm run compile:cj:native && LD_LIBRARY_PATH=./native/build-cangjie-native-dummy:./../external/incremental-cj/runtime/ck:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH ACE_LIBRARY_PATH=./native/build-cangjie-native-dummy cjpm run
scripts.external: cd ../external && npm i && cd arkoala-arkts/tools/peer-generator && npm i && npm run --prefix ../../../arkoala-arkts/arkui-common interface-sdk:download
scripts.generate:ts: npm run external && cd ../external/arkoala-arkts/tools/peer-generator && npm run generate:ts:current
scripts.generate:arkts: npm run external && cd ../external/arkoala-arkts/tools/peer-generator && npm run generate:arkts:current
scripts.generate:all: npm run external && cd ../external/arkoala-arkts/tools/peer-generator && npm run generate:all:current
scripts.arkoala:ts: npm run generate:ts && npm run compile --prefix ../external/arkoala/arkui
scripts.arkoala:ts:native:arm32: npm run generate:ts && npm run compile:native-hzvm-ohos-arm32 --prefix ../external/arkoala-arkts/framework
scripts.arkoala:ts:native:arm64: npm run generate:ts && npm run compile:native-hzvm-ohos-arm64 --prefix ../external/arkoala-arkts/framework
scripts.arkoala:har: npm run generate:ts && cd ../external && npm run arkoala:har
scripts.arkoala:har-arm32: npm run generate:ts && cd ../external && npm run arkoala:har-arm32
scripts.--todo: remove '--types chai' it is used just because tsc cli does not allow specifying empty types array with console flags
scripts.test:subset-api: npm run make:arkts && mkdir -p out/test-subset-api && cp -r out/arkts-subset/generated/libace/generated/interface/arkoala_api_generated.h ./out/test-subset-api/arkoala_api_generated.h && node ../tools/golden.mjs --input-dir ./out/test-subset-api --golden-dir ./tests/golden/subset-api
scripts.test: npm run test:core && npm run test:root && npm run test:subset-api
scripts.sanity: npm run check:subset:run && npm run check:peers:ets:run
scripts.compile:kt: npm run compile && npm run make:kt
